html:
VAT Reg. No# (300508747600003)

{{ doc.customer_name or "" }}
{{ doc.address_display or "" }}

INVOICE

 Invoice # Date Mode of Pay
{{ doc.name or "" }} {{ doc.posting_date or "" }} Credit
Order # Date Credit Days
{%- for row in doc.timesheets -%} {%- endfor -%}
No. Description Qty Unit Rate Amount (SR)
{{loop.index}} {{row.time_sheet or ""}} {{row.billing_hours or ""}} {{row.amount or ""}} {{row.billing_rate or ""}} {{row.timesheet_detail or ""}} {{row.billing_amount or ""}}
Net Amount {{ doc.net_total or "" }}
Discount {{ doc.discount_amount or "" }}
VAT (5 %) {{ doc.total_taxes_and_charges or "" }}
Grand Total {{ doc.grand_total or "" }}
{{ doc.in_words or "" }}

{{ doc.remarks or "" }}

Checked By: Accounting Manager
Thanks & Best Regards,

Operation Manager		 Signature : ........................
Name Of Receiver : ......................
Date : ....................

VAT Reg. No# (300508747600003)
If you have any questions concerning this invoice, contact [Mohamed Makhlouf] at [03-8987878 Ext-201]
THANK YOU FOR YOUR BUSINESS!
name: Main Invoice
